review_text: Great course for landing page.

Numerous, NUMEROUS misspelled words in the quiz sections.  I would encourage a program called spell-check.  The incorrect spellings here make me wonder about the accuracy of all the other info.  Thanks.
Not bad..Liked it.
Great learning about landing pages you provide comprehensive knowledge about high converting landing pages. Very Impressive...!

Teached me one of the key elements of making a landing page. Tells you in a very clearly way the entire theory and the psychological ways of how visitors approach your website. He talks in a way that makes it very understandable. Although you need to focus, and write down everything he says. Big five stars, now I have finally a clue of what I am doing and looking forward for my personal progress!
Awesome course. I've learned a lot with the course.
The content in this course is valuable. This price is nothing compare to the value it adds. To the fiverr learn please make sure to add document or slide to make our life simpler. Thank you.

I strongly recommend this course to any web designer or internet entrepreneur. The information that Issac teaches is worth far more than $26! Anyone can make a website but only a handful of designers know what it takes to control a users behavior and Issac is definitely that guy! Not only did this information help me in building my website but also gave me the skills which greatly improved my face to face sales process with my customers. On that note I'd also recommend this course to anyone that owns a business or is in sales.
Enjoy the course but the only part I did not enjoy as much is the last section on creating the landing page itself.....it was too quick and I have to keep going back
extremely well done.  Supported by extensive knowledge of the physiological and psychological determinants of persuasion.

I learned A LOT from this course. I was expecting to just learn the basics of landing pages, but what I liked about it was not only did I learn the basics, I learned more than that PLUS I learned more about my own website and what I could do to improve it. It seemed a bit longer time-wise than I expected (primarily because the price was reasonable), but that isn't necessarily a bad thing, if anything there is GREAT VALUE in purchasing this seminar. Thank you Isaac!
Awesome. I want some Divi tool courses too.
Good starting place when thinking about how to layout your website and pages. I had already created my website but I learned things that I use to change my current design.
Absolutely crazy value for the money. I've learned some super, super useful tips and tricks in order to step up my landing page game. Great course!

I have learned so much from this class; some of the practices I was already using but did not know the reason other than it looked good to me and my client. As for the landing pages, many were not really converting very well... this is about to change thanks to this class; there was so much valuable information and tips in this class - "what would I do for a klondike bar?, I'd recommend this course to all my web design clients (except for the competition). Kudos to you, Mr. Issac, and your production team.
Very Interesting, Isaac very enthusiastic and knowledgeable - very worthwhile course.
Really amazing course and very nice instructor.
Very useful and informative course

Great course! I learned a lot. Only the building a Landing Page in Unbounce got a little boring with the presenter endlessly moving around and rearranging stuff. Other than that, definitely worthwile.
Very Informative Course
Best course on learn form fiverr. I gained a huge knowledge about Landing pages that have high convertion. thank you
Very informative! SO much information for a VERY reasonable price. Well put together, and covered a LOT of ground!
Great Experience!
The course was fun to watch and easy to understand.  It was well worth the money, I learned many things I did not know and obtained a lot of valuable information.
Excellent course. A bit long but with very useful content.
Awesome Course. I gained a lot. thanks to the trainer
Excellent course! I enjoyed it
well made!

The SUBs suck. Literally. And to be honest in all of the Fiverr courses I have attended so far. It's a friggin course about landing page design and 40% of the time it says "learning pages". Tools are sometimes marked as [unintelligible], "eschew obfuscation" becomes [unintelligible], "neurotic" becomes "erratic", "howdie" becomes [unintelligible]. Spend a more than 5USD and get them done well, this is so unprofessional and annoying.

The course itself is good with lot of information, case studies, further literature. Isaac could have conveyed the same amount of information in less time, a lot of repetition.
I learned a lot of new information that I will implement on future landing pages.

Such a great course. . .  I'll have to watch it a few times as some of it went over my head, but most of all it was so excellent. I do hope there are more courses by Issac he is a great presenter and I really enjoyed listening to his experience and knowledge.

Thank you 

Sibraa
This is great

It has been a pleasure to follow Isaac course. I already knew a lot of concepts explained, but Isaac also had shown me some other nice points I will definitely use to further optimize my customer's landing pages. Besides, refreshing sales and psychology concepts is something really useful to keep us updated. Really nice course, easy to follow and Isaac shows why he is a great communicator. Thank you!

Oftentimes, I find myself writing landing page copy for businesses. I decided to take this course as a refresher to hone in on existing skills. What I found was that this course actually gave me new tips and tricks that I can start implementing immediately! Overall, my expectations were absolutely met and exceeded. Thank you Isaac! üòä
Perfect details of Creating High Converting Landing Pages.

outstanding course

Best Creating High Converting Landing Pages course ever.
This is such a great course for me. I am a web developer and designer, with the help of this course I will able to design better landing pages and give more value to my clients.
Insightful and Informative.  Two Thumbs Up!
This information was packed with practical advice and explained in an understandable way.
I learn a lot from this course and I really enjoyed the way he teaches the theories behind the optimization of landing pages.

Great course, thanks!

Excellent
Very very basic. Great for people who've never heard of landing pages. Should've advertised that
Awesome course! I love it.

This course is crucial  to present day requirements during Covid-19.For example, extreme demand of online stores, website development for e commerce.I am lucky to enroll for it
absolutely great! Not just on landing page auditing but understanding ways of thinking and depth.

Excellent content! A little extra descriptive at times and the guy talks a bit fast when explaining details.

Also LOVED the practical sections! It really put all the theory into a tangible model. I feel more confident that I can do it on my own now because of that. Thank you!

This is a phantastic course...clear and beautiful...exacly like you promote to design a website. Isaac is a phantastic speaker. I enjoy and i learn, what I have to use in a very short time to set up a webproject...whithout having experiece myself. Thank you!!!
nice course
Great content, very helpful, fun to watch, much more worth than it cost. Thank you!
Well, this course it's just great as the Google Ads course from Isaac. I hope I can find more of this and develop my web skills. Take it!

Bravo, my friend! My initial intention for taking this course was to improve my own website. However, I walked away with such a wealth of knowledge that it left me feeling empowered to the point of being able to offer my services as a consultant and/or landing page designer. Additionally, this course has inspired me to enroll in Industrial Psychology. Thanks for the education and inspiration.
Very valuable course for an amazing price
Great. Recommended.
Absolutely worth it!
Very useful information. I would highly recommend taking this course if you are a beginner or seasoned web designer.
Very educative, I learnt a lot of important techniques and ideas for designing a very high converting landing pages

There is a lot of great information and design principles to learn. I find will periodically go back to the course content to refresh some concepts. I was expecting some kind of supporting materials in the form of a copy of the slides or a booklet, by definition humans won't capture more than 20-30% of the lessons and the rest will be easily forgotten. Thanks.
I learned a lot. Made plenty of changes to my landing page as a result of the course. Thank you!

Very informative! Easy to follow and i am not a techy person. Lots of valuable information and I feel like I can create really good LPs now. Even though I will not be using the LP products mentioned in the last part of the training ( I already subscribe to others), I learned great tips for the psychology that goes into making my LPs more appealing and better converting. I especially liked the audit. Well done!

Fantastic stuff! Not only did I learn about landing pages, but also buying behavior and psychological principles of selling. Class well worth the money. You can apply this class to your main website too. A+! Five Stars!
Learnt a lot from this course. Thanks to Isaac for providing great value. will recommend. :)
Great Course!

Isaac explains everything perfectly and in a user friendly terms , really enjoyed it.

Thoroughly enjoyed this course. Delivered by an extremely passionate teacher who knows exactly what he is talking about! 10/10
Reaaaly intense and complete course on landing page optimization!
Great course. High quality audio, he understand the subject and knows how to convey the information to the learner.
Very informative course, in-depth yet easy to understand. I highly recommend it to anyone wanting to truly have a solid grasp of the concepts of creating effective landing pages.
Great course!
Fast paced and thorough. I love Isaac's presentation style and his sincerity in presenting on such an important topic. I already have 11 pages of notes and I'm just finishing the first chapter!
This is a very valuable course on landing page optimisation. Isaac is a master on CRO and UX, and communicates clearly throughout the course. Bravo!
I'm really enjoying the course and have been amazed at the levels of information provided. I truly don't have anything negative to say.
The course did just what it said. Excellent course.
great course! worth any minute :) I'm sure I'll use the principles I've learned in this course in many places. Thanks :)

Honestly this course is worth much more than it cost. Never knew I would learn so much interesting things about Web Design and Usability.
Great course!
great course !!!!!!

fantastic is an understatement!

Awesome course... Thank you so much for the valuable information...

It is an incredible course, it helped me a lot, it has much more value than it costs.
I like the way you explain & made things look so easy to understand.¬†

Isaac does an amazing job at thoroughly exploring all the biggest principles in effective landing page design, copywriting, the psychological principles behind those ideas, etc. The amount of value in this $26 course is jaw-dropping; this could've easily been sold for hundreds of dollars, and I'm really glad I have a chance to explore these concepts in so much depth for such a small price. The ideas I've taken away from this course will be instrumental towards furthering my copywriting career, adding clarity/order to my workflow, and beginning to charge higher prices for my services. I am immeasurably grateful to Isaac, to the production team behind the course, and to Fiverr's online course platform. 100/10
Very thorough and easy to follow. Would've liked a chapter on different PPC campaigns though
I would have loved to see more practical walk through n how to do some these. It has too much theory and less practical exercise

Best Course! Thanks, I learned a lot.

This is awesome ! i just completed the 1 section and  going forward is mush interesting

True story.....This course is incredible! Maybe I'm completely delusional, but I feel as if I am already prepared to design amazing landing pages and I haven't even finished the course. The instructor is fantastic!  I was on the fence about taking it, then the platform had a sale and I snapped it up. I have never gotten sooo much value for sooo little money in a course. Love it!

It is excellent, perfect for beginners since the content is explained from 0, but it is also highly recommended for advanced because it talks about things related to human behavior that nobody talks about it.

Isaac Rudansky is great instructor. Learning great from his course. Really Amazing and Professional course. Thanks.

Very insightful, I'm so glad I took this course. Thank you!
I've been dying to take the time to watch this whole course and take detailed notes and couldn't be happier that I did.  So much amazing information. Wish I had taken this 5 years ago.

The course is really good. I descoverd some new things. One thing only, it should be up to date. The examples are from 2016 and when we talk about landing pages...everything is changing so fast. So some good tools which were free few years ago, doesn't have to be free nowdays. But in generell you can learn quite a bit.
So much useful information. Concepts got explained really well with visual examples. I really recommend to anyone to take notes of the most important aspects so you can reread it later again.
Its such an amazing course for all the website, funnels, landing page builders; there is a lot to learn.
good

I highly recommend this course, Thanks Isaac!

this is the BESTTTTTT ever course i've ever bought on the planet. I've been searching how to make a high converting landing page on google, but never I had something this complete topic from A to Z. it covers not only the technical things to build a landing page, but most importantly the psychological, the idea, the big picture when planning and designing a landing page. it feels like I've attended a class on college (in which, he really has a master degree). smart, and to the point. sad to say goodbye but it has to be. thank you for being a part of my journey as a professional landing page communication strategy builder, I wont ever forget you and this course for the rest of my life. THAT memorable
The value is insane!! I can't belive the price is so cheap he could honestly get away with selling this for a couple of hundreds if not thousands!

I would have preferred if Isaac had just showed more examples of how to deliver world-class work to clients than creating logos or learning how to use Unbounce.com

I know it took him quite a bit of effort to make this course and for that I will give him 3 stars
The course is great and there is so much i've learnt through this course.

Wow! What an incredibly comprehensive and insightful course. The pure amount of information I've learnt about landing page design, as well as just human psychology in general is ridiculous. Also tremendously well taught and explained.  

Worth every penny- can't recommend this course enough!

very straightforward..simple and can be easily done
Very, very thorough, good pace, lots of engaging questions posed, relevant demonstrations of principles and examples given. Great value - am learning a lot.
Probably the content itself is good, but I wouldn't know cause the download speed is just terrible. I have a 100Mbps internet connection and even on 244p it's awful to watch such a choppy video.
This course is a Jackpot! Very expository and informative and explanations are so simplified.

REVIEW 1 ***- I learn with examples and pictures or videos. I would have liked to see several examples of the finished Index page and a landing page. I have seen exciting information, but I don't know how it fits together on a full page. I assume you will eventually show me the above, and I look forward to it.
REVIEW 2 **** - Once again, it is very interesting, but I still don't have a clear picture of my Index or other pages. How should they look, how long, how many internal links, etc?
REVIEW 3 **** - Nothing new to add.
REVIEW 4 **** - Getting a bit clearer.
REVIEW 5 **** - No comment
REVIEW 6 **** - Good learning if you are using WebFlow
FINAL Review - As I said before, I learn by seeing examples more than in long sentences. These came at the end.

This is exactly what I was after. Packed with a lot of useful and actionable information. The examples and detailed analysis of different real-life web pages, along with recommendations for improvement helped!
Very comprehensive course and a great way to improve your landing page design. If this is your first time learning how to create landing pages, you will find tremendous value in this course!

Really useful course. He explains in detail what can be done as well as how to do it.
Thank you Isaac.
Only first fevv lessons from the beginning vvas interesting. The rest, are a piece of sh*t and vvith no relevance. Also a lesson is repeated in the next lesson + added some cadres.
Great Course! This course increase my knowledge for making lead captures pages. i have been doing this past 6 years and this course add new concepts to my knowledge for landing pages

'The 3 Main Types of Landing Pages and How to Use Them Effectively' has the same video as the '5 Business Models and Understanding Your Conversion Actions Video'.  We are missing the video for '5 Business Models and Understanding Your Conversion Actions Video'

Very good.
Excellent well structured and in-depth explanation with lots of relevant theory and real-life examples
helpful and every idea he provided is very useful. I love to continue watching it.

The first 3 portions of the course were really helpful for me to understand the landing page and website optimization for better conversion. He just solved all questions related to cross-selling and upselling etc. Really enjoyed the Anchoring part which will surely help me with my web designs.  HIGHLY RECOMMENDED

What can I say? He gives really great information but is a TERRIBLE presenter. He speaks way too fast, could cut 50% of his words (ironic that one of his points to us was that we must never be too wordy on our websites), I hate his whiteboard because I can't see it on my screen. It would've been so much more powerful for him to use PowerPoint, although he clearly doesn't like it. But you know what? As the viewer, the whiteboard is too far away. And to use green markers from a distance? You can't read it. Also, his speech patterns are very distracting: He peppers his sentences with filler words, makes remarks that he thinks are funny but aren't, and kind of speaks like a college TA. Like I said, the content is good. I am learning a lot. But it is painful ‚Äì painful to listen to this guy speak for hours.

I really wish someone more experienced were giving this presentation. I wish that Fiverr had screened him before hand.
It's very informative and easy to understand if you're not a technical person.
Highly recommend! I've already started integrating these valuable insights into my voice over business and look forward to more courses by Isaac!
great.
So far I'm learning a lot of new material. They really break it down in simplest form.

Very straightforward with no bull.  Isaac does a great job of explaining the psychology behind human behavior and how it pertains to website landing page design.

So worth the money!!
Great course! Gives you important details on how users interact with the webpage and actually shows you examples on how to implement the things you learn in your own websites.
I am enjoying the course. It's packed with a lot of practical information that's helping me to understand the components of a successfully optimized landing page.

Though the course was really well prepared and well presented. The content was extremely comprehensive and very relevant. No padding. huge amount of information from someone that you feel really knows his subject and has a passion for it that shines through.
